London's First Muslim Mayor Rejects Trump's Offer to Be "Exception" to Ban Since the list showed that more than 11,000 Americans are killed each year by gun violence compared to only two that are killed by “Islamic jihadist immigrants,” it’s pretty clear where Kardashian stands on the issue. Other celebrities who took to social media to express their anger, shock, and sorrow over Saturday’s events include Kim’s sister Khloe , who tweeted “'All of this in the news today breaks my heart.”
